thread.section_title: Hilton London Angel Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: HELPFUL STAFF
thread.title_full: HELPFUL STAFF - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kINGARTHIOW
title: HELPFUL STAFF
text: Staff were professional and helpful throughout the stay. Rooms were well catered for, very comfortable beds and pillows. Good size bathroom. Only criticism was the room was warm despite turning air con down. we ate in the restaurant which was very good and generous portions and breakfast was excellent on both days. Despite the hotel being busy at breakfast, the staff were most courteous.
